name: Hannah Abbott
description: Hufflepuff student in Harry Potter's year. Prefect and member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Ludo Bagman
description: Head of the Department of Magical Games and Sports within the Ministry of Magic.

name: Bathilda Bagshot
description: Author of A History of Magic

name: Katie Bell
description: Gryffindor Quidditch Chaser one year above Harry Potter. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Cuthbert Binns
description: ghost

name: Phineas Nigellus Black
description: Great-great-grandfather of Sirius Black and former Hogwarts headmaster. His painting hangs in the office and assists the current headmaster.

name: Sirius Black
description: Harry's godfather who was a close friend of Harry's father James. Escapee from Azkaban prison and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Killed in the Battle of the Department of Mysteries by his cousin Bellatrix Lestrange.

name: Walburga Black
description: Mother of Sirius and Regulus Black. Her portrait hangs in Number 12

name: Amelia Bones
description: Head of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement

name: Susan Bones
description: Hufflepuff student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Terry Boot
description: Ravenclaw student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Lavender Brown
description: Gryffindor student in Harry's year and member of Dumbledore's Army. Killed in the Battle of Hogwarts.

name: Millicent Bulstrode
description: Slytherin student in Harry's year. Member of Dolores Umbridge's Inquisitorial Squad.

name: Charity Burbage
description: Professor of Muggle Studies at Hogwarts. Killed by Lord Voldemort.

name: Frank Bryce
description: Muggle gardener for the Riddle family. Killed by Lord Voldemort.

name: Alecto Carrow
description: Death Eater and sister of Amycus Carrow. Professor of Muggle Studies for one year

name: Amycus Carrow
description: Death Eater and brother of Alecto Carrow. Professor of Defence Against the Dark Arts for one year

name: Reginald Cattermole
description: Employee of the Magical Maintenance Department for the Ministry of Magic. Impersonated by Ron Weasley.

name: Mary Cattermole
description: Muggle-born wife of Reginald Cattermole. Saved by Harry Potter from the Muggle-born Registration Commission.

name: Cho Chang
description: Ravenclaw Quidditch Seeker one year above Harry

name: Penelope Clearwater
description: Ravenclaw prefect and girlfriend of Percy Weasley.

name: Mrs. Cole
description: Matron of the orphanage where Tom Riddle lived.

name: Michael Corner
description: Ravenclaw student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Crabbe
description: Death Eater and father of Vincent Crabbe.

name: Vincent Crabbe
description: Slytherin student in Harry's year and the son of a Death Eater. Slytherin Quidditch Beater and member of the Inquisitorial Squad. Killed by his own Fiendfyre spell.

name: Colin Creevey
description: Muggle-born Gryffindor student one year below Harry. Older brother of Dennis Creevey

name: Dennis Creevey
description: Muggle-born Gryffindor student three years below Harry. Younger brother of Colin Creevey

name: Dirk Cresswell
description: Muggle-born Head of the Goblin Liaison Office

name: Barty Crouch Sr
description: Head of the Department of International Magical Cooperation. Killed by his son Barty Crouch Jr.

name: Barty Crouch Jr
description: Death Eater credited with facilitating the return of Lord Voldemort. Used Polyjuice Potion to impersonate Alastor Moody

name: Roger Davies
description: Ravenclaw Quidditch Captain and Chaser. Attended Yule Ball with Fleur Delacour.

name: John Dawlish
description: an Auror.

name: Fleur Delacour
description: Participant in the Triwizard Tournament as a representative of wizarding school Beauxbatons. Later married Bill Weasley.

name: Gabrielle Delacour
description: Fleur's younger sister. Rescued by Harry during the Triwizard Tournament.

name: Dedalus Diggle
description: Member of the Order of the Phoenix who took the Dursleys into hiding.

name: Amos Diggory
description: Cedric Diggory's father. Employee of the Department for the Regulation and Control of Magical Creatures.

name: Cedric Diggory
description: Hufflepuff student and prefect two years above Harry. Quidditch Seeker and captain

name: Elphias Doge
description: School friend of Albus Dumbledore.

name: Antonin Dolohov
description: Death Eater who killed Fabian Prewett

name: Aberforth Dumbledore
description: Brother of Albus and Ariana Dumbledore. Owner of the Hog's Head tavern.

name: Albus Dumbledore
description: Transfiguration professor in Tom Riddle's time

name: Ariana Dumbledore
description: Sister of Albus and Aberforth Dumbledore

name: Kendra Dumbledore
description: Wife of Percival Dumbledore. Mother of Albus

name: Percival Dumbledore
description: Husband of Kendra Dumbledore

name: Dudley Dursley
description: Muggle son of Vernon Dursley and Petunia Evans

name: Marge Dursley
description: Muggle sister of Vernon Dursley.

name: Petunia Dursley
description: Harry's aunt

name: Vernon Dursley
description: Harry Potter's Muggle uncle. Petunia's husband and Dudley's father.

name: Marietta Edgecombe
description: Ravenclaw student one year above Harry. Member of Dumbledore's Army who later betrays the group to Dolores Umbridge.

name: Arabella Figg
description: Squib neighbor of the Dursleys. Member of the Order of the Phoenix.

name: Argus Filch
description: Squib caretaker of Hogwarts.

name: Justin Finch-Fletchley
description: Muggle-born Hufflepuff student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Seamus Finnigan
description: Gryffindor student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army and best friend of housemate Dean Thomas.

name: Marcus Flint
description: Slytherin Quidditch captain.

name: Mundungus Fletcher
description: Common thief and shifty Order of the Phoenix member.

name: Filius Flitwick
description: Head of Ravenclaw House and Charms professor at Hogwarts.

name: Florean Fortescue
description: Ice cream vendor at Diagon Alley.

name: Cornelius Fudge
description: Minister for Magic in the first five books. Sacked after persistently denying Lord Voldemort's return.

name: Marvolo Gaunt
description: The pure-blood father of Merope and Morfin Gaunt

name: Merope Gaunt
description: Tom Riddle's mother who died in childbirth.

name: Morfin Gaunt
description: Marvolo's son and Merope's brother. Framed by his nephew Tom Riddle for Muggle killings

name: Anthony Goldstein
description: Ravenclaw student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Goyle
description: Death Eater and father of Gregory Goyle.

name: Gregory Goyle
description: Slytherin student in Harry's year. Slytherin Quidditch Beater and member of the Inquisitorial Squad.

name: Hermione Granger
description: Muggle-born Gryffindor student in Harry's year and one of his best friends. Prefect and co-founder of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Gregorovitch
description: highly regarded Eastern European wandmaker.

name: Fenrir Greyback
description: Werewolf working for the Death Eaters.

name: Gellert Grindelwald
description: Dark wizard who was jailed after Albus Dumbledore defeated him in the 1940s.

name: Wilhelmina Grubbly-Plank
description: Substitute Care of Magical Creatures professor during Harry's fourth and fifth years.

name: Rubeus Hagrid
description: Half-giant Hogwarts gamekeeper

name: Rolanda Hooch
description: Hogwarts flying instructor and Quidditch referee.

name: Mafalda Hopkirk
description: Witch who works in the Ministry of Magic. Impersonated by Hermione Granger.

name: Angelina Johnson
description: Gryffindor student two years above Harry. Quidditch Chaser and later team captain.

name: Lee Jordan
description: Gryffindor student two years above Harry. Hogwarts Quidditch commentator and good friend of Fred and George Weasley.

name: Igor Karkaroff
description: Reformed Death Eater. Headmaster of wizarding school Durmstrang.

name: Viktor Krum
description: Bulgarian Quidditch Seeker and Durmstrang student who participated in the Triwizard Tournament.

name: Silvanus Kettleburn
description: Care of Magical Creatures teacher until Harry's third year.

name: Bellatrix Lestrange
description: Cousin of Sirius Black. Death Eater who tortured Neville Longbottom's parents Frank and Alice into insanity. Killed by Molly Weasley during the Battle of Hogwarts.

name: Rabastan Lestrange
description: Death Eater. Brother of Rodolphus Lestrange.

name: Rodolphus Lestrange
description: Death Eater. Bellatrix's husband and Rabastan's brother.

name: Gilderoy Lockhart
description: Fraudulent celebrity author and Defence Against the Dark Arts teacher. Lost his memory after a memory charm backfired and resided in St. Mungo's afterwards.

name: Alice and Frank Longbottom
description: Neville Longbottom's parents. Aurors and members of the original Order of the Phoenix. Tortured into insanity by Bellatrix Lestrange.

name: Augusta Longbottom
description: Frank's mother and Neville's grandmother

name: Neville Longbottom
description: Gryffindor student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Luna Lovegood
description: Xenophilius Lovegood's daughter and Ravenclaw student one year below Harry. Member of Dumbledore's Army and wife of Newt Scamander's grandson Rolf.

name: Xenophilius Lovegood
description: Luna's father. Editor of tabloid magazine The Quibbler.

name: Remus Lupin
description: Lycanthropic Gryffindor student before Harry's time who befriended Sirius Black and James Potter. Professor of Defence Against the Dark Arts in Harry's third year

name: Teddy Lupin
description: Son of Remus Lupin and Nymphadora Tonks

name: Walden Macnair
description: Death Eater and Committee of Disposal of Dangerous Creatures' executioner. Injured badly by Hagrid during the Battle of Hogwarts.

name: Draco Malfoy
description: Slytherin student in Harry's year. Quidditch Seeker

name: Lucius Malfoy
description: Draco's father and an influential Death Eater. Governor of Hogwarts early in the series.

name: Narcissa Malfoy
description: Lucius' wife and Draco's mother. Sister of Bellatrix Lestrange and Andromeda Tonks.

name: Scorpius Malfoy
description: Son of Draco Malfoy and Astoria Greengrass.

name: Madam Malkin
description: Clothing shop owner in Diagon Alley.

name: Griselda Marchbanks
description: Governor of the Wizarding Examinations Authority which ran the O.W.L

name: Olympe Maxime
description: Half-giantess. Headmistress of Beauxbatons.

name: Ernie Macmillan
description: Hufflepuff student in Harry's year. Prefect and member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Minerva McGonagall
description: Hogwarts Transfiguration professor

name: Cormac McLaggen
description: Gryffindor student one year above Harry Potter. Quidditch Keeper and member of Horace Slughorn's Slug Club.

name: Graham Montague
description: Slytherin Quidditch Chaser who became trapped inside a Vanishing Cabinet for six months.

name: Alastor (Mad-Eye) Moody
description: Retired Auror and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Impersonated by Barty Crouch Jr. in his scheme to enter Harry into the Triwizard Tournament. Killed by Voldemort.

name: Theodore Nott
description: Slytherin student in the same year as Harry Potter

name: Bob Ogden
description: Leader of the Department of Magical Law Enforcement Squad in the 1920s. Turned the Gaunt family over to the Wizengamot for using magic in front of a Muggle. Died before Harry Potter's sixth year.

name: Garrick Ollivander
description: Wandmaker and owner of the Ollivanders wand shop. Kidnapped by the Malfoy family for several months until freed by Harry

name: Pansy Parkinson
description: Slytherin student in Harry's year. Prefect and member of the Inquisitorial Squad.

name: Padma Patil
description: Ravenclaw student in Harry's year. Identical twin sister of Gryffindor student Parvati Patil

name: Parvati Patil
description: Gryffindor student in Harry's year and Padma's identical twin sister. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Peter Pettigrew
description: Death Eater and former school friend of James Potter

name: Antioch
description: Cadmus

name: Irma Pince
description: Hogwarts librarian.

name: Sturgis Podmore
description: Member of the Order of the Phoenix.

name: Poppy Pomfrey
description: Hogwarts school nurse.

name: Harry Potter
description: The main character of the series. Orphaned son of James and Lily Potter

name: James Potter
description: Harry Potter's father and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Killed along with his wife Lily by Lord Voldemort prior to the start of the series.

name: Lily Potter
description: Harry Potter's mother and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Killed by Lord Voldemort.

name: Albus Severus Potter
description: Second child of Harry Potter and Ginny Weasley.

name: James Sirius Potter
description: Harry and Ginny's first child.

name: Lily Luna Potter
description: Harry and Ginny's third child.

name: Quirinus Quirrell
description: Defence Against the Dark Arts professor in Harry Potter's first year. Possessed by Lord Voldemort.

name: Helena Ravenclaw/The Grey Lady
description: Daughter of house founder Rowena Ravenclaw. Stole and hid her mother's diadem

name: Mary Riddle
description: Thomas Riddle Sr.'s Muggle wife

name: Thomas Riddle Sr.
description: Mary's Muggle husband and Thomas Riddle Jr.'s father. Killed by Voldemort.

name: Thomas Riddle Jr.
description: Voldemort's Muggle father and Merope Gaunt's husband. Killed by his son

name: Thomas Marvolo Riddle
description: Slytherin student who became Lord Voldemort.

name: Demelza Robins
description: Gryffindor student and Quidditch Chaser.

name: Augustus Rookwood
description: Death Eater and spy working in the Department of Mysteries.

name: Thorfinn Rowle
description: Death Eater.

name: Albert Runcorn
description: Ministry of Magic employee whose chief function was as an investigator of alleged Muggle-borns.

name: Newt Scamander
description: Magizoologist and author of Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them. Main character in the Fantastic Beasts film series. Expelled Hogwarts student who excels in curing different sicknesses.

name: Rufus Scrimgeour
description: Head of the Auror Office who replaces Cornelius Fudge as Minister for Magic. Killed by Death Eaters.

name: Kingsley Shacklebolt
description: Auror and member of the Order of the Phoenix. Replaces Pius Thicknesse as Minister for Magic.

name: Stan Shunpike
description: Conductor of the triple-decker Knight Bus. Jailed in Azkaban on suspicions of being a Death Eater.

name: Aurora Sinistra
description: Astronomy professor at Hogwarts.

name: Rita Skeeter
description: Reporter and tabloid journalist for the Daily Prophet.

name: Horace Slughorn
description: Former Hogwarts Potions professor and Head of Slytherin House

name: Salazar Slytherin
description: One of the four founders of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry

name: Zacharias Smith
description: Hufflepuff Quidditch Chaser in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Severus Snape
description: Potions and later Defence Against the Dark Arts professor at Hogwarts. Head of Slytherin House

name: Alicia Spinnet
description: Gryffindor student two years above Harry. Quidditch Chaser and member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Pomona Sprout
description: Hogwarts Herbology professor and Head of Hufflepuff House.

name: Pius Thicknesse
description: Minister for Magic while under the Imperius Curse. Replaced by Kingsley Shacklebolt.

name: Dean Thomas
description: Gryffindor student in Harry's year. Member of Dumbledore's Army.

name: Andromeda Tonks
description: Sister of Bellatrix Lestrange and Narcissa Malfoy

name: Nymphadora Tonks
description: Ted and Andromeda's daughter. Auror and member of the Order of the Phoenix. She marries Remus Lupin and becomes the mother of a son

name: Ted Tonks
description: Andromeda's Muggle-born husband

name: Sybill Trelawney
description: Hogwarts Divination professor. Predicted the prophecy that prompted Lord Voldemort to go after the Potters.

name: Wilkie Twycross
description: Hogwarts Apparition instructor who works in the Department of Magical Transportation.

name: Dolores Umbridge
description: Senior Undersecretary to the Minister for Magic

name: Emmeline Vance
description: Member of the Order of the Phoenix. Killed by Death Eaters.

name: Romilda Vane
description: Gryffindor student who unsuccessfully tries to romance Harry.

name: Septima Vector
description: Arithmancy professor at Hogwarts.

name: Lord Voldemort (Tom Marvolo Riddle)â€“ The villain of the series. Murderer of Harry Potter's parents and many others in his quest for immortality and absolute power.
Myrtle Warren/Moaning Myrtle
description: Muggle-born Ravenclaw student during Tom Riddle's time at Hogwarts. Killed by the Basilisk in a girls' bathroom

name: Arthur Weasley
description: Muggle-obsessed Ministry of Magic employee

name: Bill Weasley
description: Oldest son of Arthur and Molly Weasley

name: Charlie Weasley
description: Second son of Arthur and Molly Weasley. Member of the Order of the Phoenix. Works with dragons in Romania.

name: Fred Weasley
description: Son of Arthur and Molly Weasley and identical twin brother of George Weasley. Gryffindor Quidditch Beater and member of Dumbledore's Army

name: George Weasley
description: Son of Arthur and Molly Weasley and identical twin brother of Fred Weasley. Gryffindor Quidditch Beater and member of Dumbledore's Army. Co-owner of Weasleys' Wizard Wheezes.

name: Ginny Weasley
description: Only daughter and youngest child of Arthur and Molly Weasley. Gryffindor student one year below Harry

name: Hugo Weasley
description: Son of Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger

name: Molly Weasley
description: Wife of Arthur Weasley and mother of Bill

name: Percy Weasley
description: Third son of Arthur and Molly Weasley. Gryffindor prefect and Head Boy

name: Ron Weasley
description: Youngest son of Arthur and Molly Weasley who is best friends with Harry Potter and Hermione Granger. Gryffindor Quidditch Keeper

name: Oliver Wood
description: Gryffindor Quidditch Keeper and captain four years above Harry.

name: Rose Weasley
description: Daughter of Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger. Sister of Hugo Weasley.

name: Corban Yaxley
description: Death Eater. Head of Magical Law Enforcement under Voldemort's regime.

name: Blaise Zabini
description: Slytherin student in Harry's year.

name: Aragog
description: Giant spider raised by Rubeus Hagrid and lived in the Forbidden Forest.

name: Bane
description: Centaur

name: Beedle the Bard
description: Author of several wizarding fairy tales including The Tale of the Three Brothers.

name: The Bloody Baron
description: Slytherin House ghost. Suitor of Helena Ravenclaw before killing her in a fit of blind rage

name: Bogrod
description: Head goblin at Gringotts Wizarding Bank. Put under the Imperius curse when Harry

name: Buckbeak
description: Hippogriff belonging at various times to Hagrid

name: Sir Cadogan
description: Armored and somewhat mad knight occupying a painting in Hogwarts.

name: Crookshanks
description: Intelligent cat belonging to Hermione Granger.

name: Dobby
description: House-elf originally belonging to the Malfoy family until he is set free by Harry in Chamber of Secrets.

name: Errol
description: Owl belonging to the Weasley family.

name: Fang
description: Hagrid's pet boarhound.

name: The Fat Friar
description: Hufflepuff House ghost.

name: The Fat Lady
description: Witch in the painting concealing the entrance to the Gryffindor common room.

name: Fawkes
description: Phoenix belonging to Albus Dumbledore. Saved Harry Potter from the Basilisk inside the Chamber of Secrets.

name: Firenze
description: Centaur and substitute Divination professor at Hogwarts during Harry's fifth year.

name: Fluffy
description: Three-headed dog belonging to Hagrid and protector of the Philosopher's Stone.

name: Gornuk
description: Gringotts goblin who goes on the run from Death Eaters in Deathly Hallows along with fellow goblin Griphook

name: Grawp
description: Giant and Hagrid's half-brother.

name: Griphook
description: Gringotts Bank goblin who helps Harry and his friends steal Helga Hufflepuff's cup from within the Lestrange vault.

name: Hedwig
description: Harry Potter's pet owl. Killed during the Battle of the Seven Potters.

name: Hokey
description: House-elf belonging to Hepzibah Smith.

name: Kreacher
description: House-elf belonging to the Black family and later Harry Potter. Though at first preferring to serve the pureblood line (including Regulus Black

name: Magorian
description: A centaur.

name: Great Aunt Muriel
description: The Weasley children's great-aunt.

name: Nagini
description: Lord Voldemort's massive pet snake that does his bidding. She is one of Voldemort's Horcruxes who is ultimately slain by Neville Longbottom during the Battle of Hogwarts.

name: Nearly Headless Nick
description: Gryffindor house ghost. Full name is Sir Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington.

name: Norbert
description: A baby dragon illegally owned by Hagrid who is relocated to a reserve in Romania by friends of Ron's older brother Charlie Weasley.

name: Peeves
description: Hogwarts poltergeist

name: Pigwidgeon
description: A tiny mischievous owl belonging to Ron Weasley. Called "Pig" for short.

name: Madam Rosmerta
description: Proprietor of The Three Broomsticks inn in Hogsmeade village.

name: Ronan
description: A centaur living in the Forbidden Forest.

name: Scabbers
description: Ron Weasley's pet rat in the first three stories who is revealed to be a wizard in animal form: Peter Pettigrew.

name: Scabior
description: Snatcher who captures Harry

name: Travers
description: Wizard and Death Eater who escapes from Azkaban after Lord Voldemort's return.

name: Trevor
description: Neville Longbottom's perpetually-misplaced pet toad.

name: Winky
description: A female house-elf who belonged to Barty Crouch Sr until he sacked her
